prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that glows in the dark and has a playful disposition.
Show me an aquatic creature inspired by both fish and lanterns with bright colors.
Imagine a blue and yellow Pokemon that is known for its ability to light up underwater.
Design a Pokemon that combines the features of a whale and a lantern, perfect for ocean adventures.
Generate a cute, friendly Pokemon that can be found swimming in deep sea caves.
Make a Pokemon that has a small, rounded body and emits light to attract other sea creatures.
Give me a creature that has a charming face and uses its light to lure in prey.

distinctive_features: Long antenna with a light bulb
